video.title: Robin Hood
video.synopsis: This retelling of the Robin Hood tale features a hip Robin and his cynical manservant battling the brilliant but evil Sheriff of Nottingham.

episodes.synopsis: Robin of Locksley returns from the Crusades to find his people victimized by the new Sheriff, and takes up bow and arrow to fight for their freedom.
episodes.title: Will You Tolerate This?

episodes.synopsis: The humiliated Sheriff storms Locksley village and demands that Robin Hood surrender. But with the forest outlaws on Robin's side, all is not lost.
episodes.title: Sheriff Got Your Tongue?

episodes.synopsis: Robin must make an unholy alliance with the Sheriff to clear his name when a mysterious sniper murders innocent people in Nottingham.
episodes.title: Who Shot the Sheriff?

episodes.synopsis: Robin and his men find an abandoned baby in Sherwood Forest moments before the Sheriff nabs Roy, who must kill Robin Hood or watch his mother hang.
episodes.title: Parent Hood

episodes.synopsis: Robin must bow out of the Nottingham Fair's silver arrow competition when the Sheriff tries to buy Saracen slave labor for his lethal mine.
episodes.title: Turk Flu

episodes.synopsis: Robin and his gang aren't fooled when they meet a farmer who claims he's a tax inspector charged with counting the tax silver in Nottingham Castle.
episodes.title: The Taxman Cometh

episodes.synopsis: Allan's long-lost brother Tom and his crooked friends tag along with the gang, first trying to rob Marian's house, then getting caught by the Sheriff.
episodes.title: Brothers in Arms

episodes.synopsis: On King Richard's birthday, Djaq is captured when the gang raids Gisborne's party at Locksley Manor and Robin uncovers a terrible secret.
episodes.title: Tattoo? What Tattoo?

episodes.synopsis: Castle scientist Lambert's explosive new "black powder" invention makes him a victim of the Sheriff's torture.
episodes.title: A Thing or Two About Loyalty

episodes.synopsis: When Robin saves an arsonist from a burning church he unleashes events culminating in the discovery of a mysterious visitor at Nottingham Castle.
episodes.title: Peace? Off!

episodes.synopsis: On a trip to Locksley, Robin and Little John witness a brutal tax collection, the capture of their bowmaker and the arrest of Little John's son.
episodes.title: Dead Man Walking

episodes.synopsis: King Richard's return to England hails an uneventful future for Will and Allan, and Marian's impending marriage to Gisborne.
episodes.title: The Return of the King

episodes.synopsis: Robin still tries to cope with losing Marian, refusing to help Edward confront the king, and abandoning Much and the gang.
episodes.title: A Clue: No

episodes.synopsis: While Robin and the gang construct their ingenious new camp, Knighton Hall is razed and Marian and Edward are taken to the castle under house arrest.
episodes.title: Sister Hood

episodes.synopsis: In his first mission since discovering the devastating truth about operation Shah Mat, Robin launches a raid on Nottingham Castle's new Strong Room.
episodes.title: The Booby and the Beast

episodes.synopsis: When a group of boys stumble on Gisborne's weapons-testing site, one resourceful escapee eludes Gisborne's men and raises the alarm with Robin.
episodes.title: Child Hood

episodes.synopsis: The Sheriff and his sinister scientist test a chemical weapon on a Nottingham street and blame the ill effects on the pestilence.
episodes.title: The Angel of Death

episodes.synopsis: A horrified Robin fears for Marian's safety when he realizes that his plan to capture the Sheriff's spy has failed because of a traitor in his gang.
episodes.title: Ducking and Diving

episodes.synopsis: As the Black Knights gather to vow allegiance to Prince John, Robin and his men infiltrate the castle to find the only man who can stop them.
episodes.title: For England...!

episodes.synopsis: Robin hatches a plan to get written proof of the Sheriff's treason when lovelorn John of York and his chest of silver pass by Robin and the gang.
episodes.title: Show Me the Money

episodes.synopsis: Now a full-fledged outlaw, Marian surprises everyone with a new energy and recklessness, and jeopardizes a mission to aid a ransacked village.
episodes.title: Get Carter

episodes.synopsis: A mortally wounded, one-legged messenger flees Gisborne's men and tells Robin that the King needs him to return to fight in the Holy Land.
episodes.title: Lardner's Ring

episodes.synopsis: The tormented Sheriff sleepwalks into Sherwood Forest and is still gone when Prince John's messenger arrives to review conditions in Nottingham.
episodes.title: Walkabout

episodes.synopsis: The Sheriff turns Locksley into a garrison town, throwing its people out to make room for an army of vicious mercenaries.
episodes.title: Treasure of the Nation

episodes.synopsis: Ambushed at Robin's birthday party, the outlaws tell their secrets as the traitor, Allan, learns that the Sheriff and Gisborne mean to kill the King.
episodes.title: A Good Day to Die

episodes.synopsis: In the Holy Land, Robin warns the King of a threat to his life, but the Sheriff makes sure Robin and his men are seen as traitors instead of heroes.
episodes.title: We Are Robin Hood

episodes.synopsis: When Robin returns to avenge Marian's murder, an epic battle rages between him and Gisborne, with both determined to fight to the death.
episodes.title: Total Eclipse

episodes.synopsis: The Sheriff sells the local men to Irish warriors who need new army recruits, but when Robin is captured, can he escape death in time to save them?
episodes.title: Cause and Effect

episodes.synopsis: The Sheriff turns up the heat on Robin and his gang by forcing the abbot to accuse them of stealing from the church.
episodes.title: Lost in Translation

episodes.synopsis: Ruthless Rufus is in town, intent on revenge. When he kidnaps Allan and Kate, Robin retaliates by snatching his son.
episodes.title: Sins of the Father

episodes.synopsis: Gisborne is back, and he's not alone; by his side are Prince John's elite guards and a mysterious weapon. This time, he's determined to catch Robin.
episodes.title: Let the Games Commence

episodes.synopsis: Prince John pays a visit to Nottingham, and he's out to make mischief.
episodes.title: Do You Love Me?

episodes.synopsis: A heat wave hits Nottinghamshire. When Prince John blocks all the local wells, the outlaws take desperate measures to save those at risk.
episodes.title: Too Hot to Handle

episodes.synopsis: Isabella will go to any lengths to prove her loyalty to the Prince -- and to win the Sheriff's job for herself.
episodes.title: The King Is Dead, Long Live the King

episodes.synopsis: Gisborne awaits his execution in a Nottingham dungeon and meets a fellow prisoner who has a profound effect on him.
episodes.title: A Dangerous Deal

episodes.synopsis: A mysterious figure forces Robin and Gisborne to hear about their past, and the truth about their parents rocks them both to the core.
episodes.title: Bad Blood

episodes.synopsis: The gang is shocked when Robin announces that Gisborne is joining their fight against Isabella, but can their uneasy truce survive?
episodes.title: The Enemy of My Enemy

episodes.synopsis: The battle begins as Isabella rounds up men to send to Prince John, and the gang does its best to stop her.
episodes.title: Something Worth Fighting For: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: War breaks out in Nottingham as the Sheriff attacks with all his might. Robin and the gang fight to defend the castle, but are forced to retreat.
episodes.title: Something Worth Fighting For: Part 2
